voicesplitting.gui

Class VoiceSplittingRunner

  • java.lang.Object
    • voicesplitting.gui.VoiceSplittingRunner

  • public class VoiceSplittingRunner
extends java.lang.Object
    A BeatTrackingRunner is the class which interfaces between a VoiceSplittingGUI and the actual program logic.
    Author:
    Andrew McLeod - 17 June, 2015

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private java.util.List<java.util.List<MidiNote>> goldStandardVoices
      A List of the gold standard voices for this song.
      private java.io.File midiFile
      The currently loaded MIDI file.
      private NoteListGenerator nlg
      A List of the notes of the currently loaded file.
      private TimeTracker tt
      The TimeTracker for the currently loaded file.

    • Constructor Detail

      • VoiceSplittingRunner

        public VoiceSplittingRunner(java.io.File midiFile,
                    boolean useChannel)
                     throws javax.sound.midi.InvalidMidiDataException,
                            java.io.IOException,
                            java.lang.InterruptedException
        Create a new BeatTrackingRunner on the given File.
        Parameters:
        midiFile - midiFile
        useChannel - True if we want to use the input data's channel as gold standard voices. False to use track instead.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - If some I/O error occurred when reading the file.
        javax.sound.midi.InvalidMidiDataException - If the file contained some invlaid MIDI data.
        java.lang.InterruptedException - If this is running on a GUI and gets cancelled.

    • Method Detail

        Get a list of the gold standard voices for this song.

      • getTimeTracker

        public TimeTracker getTimeTracker()
        Get the TimeTracker used in this runner.
        Returns:
        tt

      • getNlg

        public NoteListGenerator getNlg()
        Get the NoteListGeneratr from the current loaded MIDI file.
        Returns:
        nlg, or null if no MIDI file is loaded yet.

      • getFile

        public java.io.File getFile()
        Get the MIDI file associated with this runner.
